name: Bounce The Ball (Viridian)
description:
Bounce The Ball Is A Game That I Made, I Took Some Inspiration From Pong, It Is More Modern And Multiplayer For 2 People.

Get 10 Points To Win And Press R To Restart The Game If The Game Has Any Glitches.

For Red Use W And S To Move And For Blue Use The Up Arrow And The Down Arrow To Move.

It Is Fun.
